export function runIntroAnimation(){var intro=document.querySelector('.intro');var logo1Span=document.querySelectorAll('.logo1');setTimeout(function(){logo1Span.forEach(function(span,idx){setTimeout(function(){span.classList.add('active');},(idx+1)*400);});setTimeout(function(){logo1Span.forEach(function(span,idx){setTimeout(function(){span.classList.remove('active');span.classList.add('fade');},(idx+1)*50);});},2000);setTimeout(function(){intro.style.top='-100vh';},2300);},1000);// Adjust the delay as needed
}
